issue.title: eksisozluk1923.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://eksisozluk1923.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Feksisozluk1923.com) ### Comment > eksisozluk1923 and its old versions had a double click problem where you needed to double click every link on the website because the first click would only trigger an ad and nothing would happen. The ad that got triggered had the class "ad-doubleclickwebinterstital". > > AdGuard Turkish has a rule for this in the TurkishFilter/sections/css_extended.txt file: > "eksisozluk1923.com#$?#.ad-doubleclickwebinterstital { remove: true; }" > > This rule has been preventing the double click problem for a while. Now it seems like the website added another element that causes the double click problem, which has the class "interstitial-close-link-source". > > I can confirm that adding this rule to My Filters fixes the problem: > "eksisozluk1923.com#$?#.interstitial-close-link-source { remove: true; }" > > So maybe that could be added alongside the old class rule. Thank you ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/WOOi4wD.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- Platform: | uBlock Origin Browser: | Firefox Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base,
EasyList

EasyPrivacy,
Peter Lowe's Blocklist

issue.title: Google Play: com.kakao.talk
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.kakao.talk](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fplay.google.com%2Fstore%2Fapps%2Fdetails%3Fid%3Dcom.kakao.talk) ### Comment > 삼성 갤럭시 듀얼 메신저 기능을 사용할 시 해당 앱의 광고가 차단되지 않음 > > Advertisements in the app are not blocked when using the Samsung Galaxy dual messenger function ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/YQ2exsg.jpg)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- Platform: | Android 13 AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Android v3.6.54 AdGuard mode: | proxy Filtering quality: | High-quality HTTPS filtering: | disabled Stealth mode: | disabled DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads Userscripts: | 애드가드 엑스트라

### Issue URL (Annoyance) [http://176.123.6.124/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2F176.123.6.124%2F) ### Comment Username: @abidjauhar17 > annoying pop-ups :( > actually this has been blocked by the Adguard filter, only the site address has been changed from the previous one (http://91.208.197.43) to the current one (http://176.123.6.124) > > I guess maybe it won't take long to solve the problem? > > http://176.123.6.124/ > http://176.123.6.124/katarsis-episode-4/ ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/WYXyK6o.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/60BbPUW.png)
